author: Staff Reporter
text:
A couple was killed on the spot after their two-wheeler was hit by a car at Kakapalayam here on Wednesday. Krishnaswamy (64), a retired veterinary doctor, along with his wife Vasantha (60) of Periyamanali in Namakkal district were returning to their native after visiting their son at Elampillai.

While nearing Selliyampalayam on Salem – Coimbatore National Highway, their vehicle was hit by a car going from Sankari to Salem.

The police have launched a search for the car driver
title: Namakkal veterinarian, wife die in accident
